attributes.action: listen to the british people or resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People i talk to are sick of the current prime minister doing as he pleases without listening to what we have to say. His job is to represent us, not the other way around. This is our country but we are not being listened to. I want our prime minister to activly listen to us and stop telling us what we want, or resign his position. If he doesn't want to resign, then call a general election so we (The british people) can decide if we agree with him or not. No doubt, he will ignore us yet again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
